solution_line_template: He starts with {asparagus_initial_weight_per_day}+{broccoli_initial_weight_per_day}=<<{asparagus_initial_weight_per_day}+{broccoli_initial_weight_per_day}={initial_daily_vegetable_weight}>>{initial_daily_vegetable_weight} pounds of vegetables a day

After doubling that it goes to {initial_daily_vegetable_weight}*{doubling_factor}=<<{initial_daily_vegetable_weight}*{doubling_factor}={doubled_daily_vegetable_weight}>>{doubled_daily_vegetable_weight} pound a day
So he eats {doubled_daily_vegetable_weight}*{days_per_week}={weekly_asparagus_broccoli_weight} pounds of asparagus and broccoli per week

So he eats a total of {weekly_asparagus_broccoli_weight}+{kale_weekly_weight}=<<{weekly_asparagus_broccoli_weight}+{kale_weekly_weight}={total_weekly_vegetable_weight}>>{total_weekly_vegetable_weight} pounds of vegetables a week
